transcript:
Customer: Hari anant hari katha ananta.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello. Namaste sir.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan ji. Haan sir main Hemant baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se kaun bol rahe hain.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir aap buyleads vagera use nahi kar rahe IndiaMART ki ya fir koi issue aa raha hai kya sir abhi?

Customer: Bhaiya issue issue aa raha hai yaar.
Refund karwa do yaar mere yaar.

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Aap refund karwa do mere.

Executive: Refund? Sir abhi to aapne start ki hai service.

Customer: Haan vahi to business to aa liya. Kya jhooth bolte ho tum log.

Executive: Arre nahi sir aisa nahi hai kya kya problem kya aa rahi hai sir aapko?

Customer: Problem hi problem hai bhai.

Executive: Haan sir bataiye na problem kya aa rahi hai lead karne mein koi problem hai, buylead mein koi issue hai.

Customer: Bhai buylead mein kya koi si bhi consume kar lo vahi saali aisi hai jaise matlab third party ke log rahe hue hain.
Bhai bekar hai bhai jhooth bol ke karwate hain ye log.

Executive: To sir aapka jo matlab aapka business hai vo camere ka hai na total camera vamera setup ka.

Customer: Bhai yahan dono hi hain.
Handicraft ka bhi aur ye bhi.

Executive: Ji ji ji. Ah abhi abhi sir camere to matlab business aapka all over India mein karna hai na sir aapko ya fir nahi karna hai. Buyleads to aapke paas hai hi sir.

Customer: All over India nahi hai sirf Nainital ka tha.

Executive: Achha thik hai. Matlab buyleads to sir aapke paas camere ki bhi hain. Apna primary product bata sakte hain sir camere ke alava ek to camera ho gaya aapka.

Customer: Primary matlab?
Matlab aapko karna hi hai matlab dekho ek CCTV camera hai aapka vo to aap karte hi ho aapka primary product aur uske alava bhi hai kya sir aapke alava bhi iske alava?

Customer: Haan main bata to raha hun handicraft ka.

Executive: Handicraft ka. Haan lekin sir aap buyleads use to karo kam se kam aap buyleads use nahi kar rahe ho follow up le rahe ho sir time se nahi le pa rahe ho ya kuch issue aa raha hai aapko?

Customer: Maine kya hai. Bhai ab dekho itna time nahi hai ki main usi mein laga raha hun. Thik hai mere se ye bola gaya tha aapke paas full time nahi. Thik hai varna jaise ye aap consume karta hun na bhai phone utha raha vo nahi uthata. Koi uthata bhi hai to [inaudible] mujhe dhyan mein le raha hun main kahunga itna jaldi se. Bhai matlab aise maan lo bilkul thake hue customer jo hote hain vo. Is type ke aise maan lo aap.

Executive: Okay. Ah ek ek ek baat bataiye sir mujhe aap WhatsApp use karte ho na sir?

Customer: Haan WhatsApp use karta hun.

Executive: Agar main WhatsApp pe aapko buylead bhej dun aapke product ki to aap use kar paoge unko nahi kar paoge. Time to time main daily basis pe do teen do teen agar aapko buylead bhej dun to aap unko to use kar sakte ho na agar aapko kuch issue aa raha hai IndiaMART use karne mein to direct buylead se use kar sakte ho na sir aap. Agar genuine lead bhejoge to fir use mein karunga main lekin agar vahi aap third class lead bhejoge to bataiye aap kya fayda hoga usse. Nahi sir genuine hi bhejunga aapke product se related hi bhejunga buylead. Buylead aise nahi bhejunga matlab aap camere ka kaam kar rahe ho main mobile phone ki aapke paas buylead bhej dun aisi nahi bhejunga. Main camere ki bhi bhejunga aur dekho sir aapke na buylead check hi nahi hai aapke paas abhi paanch saat ghante pehle hi abhi buylead aayi hai ek to Ghaziabad se hai Hapur se hai camera installer ki bhi hai aur ki bhi hai ye camera ki aur sir Rajasthan se bhi hai aapke paas mein CCTV camera hai aur Bhiwani se hai Haryana se lekin main na unse bol diya tha pehli baat to jaise ye unhone farzi update kar rakha hai. Ye jo photos hain ye unhone khud apne end se kari hain ye aapne nahi kari hain ye aapne jo photo daal diye.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir farzi aisa kuch bhi nahi hai aap mujhe bataiye aapne kis number se aap WhatsApp use karte ho na sir aap?

Customer: Kya sir?

Executive: Kisi se karta hun same number hai WhatsApp mera. Aur same number hai aapka sir aap ek minute rukiye main na aapko buylead bhej raha hun abhi aapko WhatsApp pe same number pe ek baar mujhe number confirm kara denge sir aap ek kyunki mujhe hai na aapka number aapka pura dikhta nahi hai. Main bata deta hun.

Customer: Kya sir?
Main bata deta hun aap note kijiye.

Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir jaise abhi aapka jo number se start hota hai sir ye wala?

Customer: 9456.

Executive: 9456.

Customer: 4744.

Executive: 4744.

Customer: 32.

Executive: 32.

Customer: Ek minute sir main abhi pehle to mujhe bheja hai aapko.
Bhai itna jhooth bolte hain na yaar ye tumhare matlab jo ye karwate hain aise. Bhai bahut jhooth bolte hain yaar.

Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir main main aapse bol raha hun na ki main bhejunga abhi aapko WhatsApp pe buyleads screenshot bhi bhejunga aur buylead ki link bhi bhejunga dono to please aap unko consume kar lo main abhi screenshot bhej de raha hun aur ek minute main just abhi aapko buyleads ka link bhi bhej de raha hun sir to please aap vahan se use kar lo aur sir main fir kal aapko fir phone karta hun aap mujhe batana ki kya response raha unka unhone revert kiya aapko nahi kiya kya issue aa raha hai.

Customer: Thik hai bhej do.

Executive: Thik hai thik hai okay thank you sir thank you so much thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Claims buyleads are from third-party individuals.

- Alleges that IndiaMART uses deceptive practices.

- States that the photos in the profile are fake.



Resolution:

- Executive assured that genuine leads will be sent.

- Executive offered to send buyleads via WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed the customer's WhatsApp number.

- Executive promised to send screenshots and links of buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer the next day.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, whatsapp, subscription, fake profile
